heroHeadline: Google Ads Management That Delivers ROI in Galway City
heroSubheadline: Certified Google Partner • Data-Driven Campaigns • Proven Results
description:
Want to dominate Google search results in Galway City and drive immediate, qualified traffic to your business? Kraft Agency's Google Ads management service delivers precisely targeted PPC campaigns that turn ad spend into revenue. As a certified Google Partner agency based right here in Galway, we combine local market expertise with advanced paid advertising strategies to help businesses across the city generate more leads, sales, and revenue from their digital marketing investment.

Our approach to Google Ads goes far beyond simply bidding on keywords. We develop comprehensive PPC strategies tailored to Galway City businesses, from retail shops on Shop Street to professional services in Parkmore Business Park, from restaurants in the Latin Quarter to e-commerce businesses serving customers nationwide. Every campaign is meticulously structured with strategic keyword targeting, compelling ad copy that converts, optimized landing pages, and continuous performance monitoring. We don't waste your budget on irrelevant clicks—every euro is invested strategically to reach potential customers actively searching for your products or services in Galway and beyond.

What sets Kraft Agency apart is our obsessive focus on return on investment. We use AI-powered bid optimization, advanced audience targeting, and sophisticated conversion tracking to ensure your Google Ads deliver measurable business results. Whether you're looking to increase website traffic, generate quality leads, drive phone calls, boost online sales, or increase foot traffic to your Galway City location, we build campaigns engineered for your specific goals. With transparent reporting and regular strategy sessions, you'll always know exactly what you're getting for your investment and how your campaigns are performing against your business objectives.

process.title: Business Goals & Market Analysis
process.description: We start with in-depth discovery of your business objectives, target audience, and competitive landscape in Galway City. This foundation ensures every campaign decision aligns with what matters most to your business.

process.title: Strategic Campaign Architecture
process.description: We build comprehensive campaign structures with strategic keyword research, compelling ad copy, audience targeting, and optimized settings designed to maximize performance while minimizing wasted spend.

process.title: Landing Page Optimization
process.description: We ensure your landing pages are optimized for conversions, with clear value propositions, strong calls-to-action, and fast loading speeds. Great ads need great landing pages to convert clicks into customers.

process.title: Campaign Launch & Monitoring
process.description: Once campaigns are live, we closely monitor performance, making immediate adjustments to bidding, targeting, and ad creative based on real-time data to optimize results from day one.

process.title: Conversion Tracking & Attribution
process.description: We implement comprehensive conversion tracking across all customer touchpoints—calls, forms, purchases, store visits—so you can see exactly how Google Ads drives business results and ROI.

process.title: Continuous Testing & Optimization
process.description: PPC management never stops. We continuously test ad variations, refine targeting, optimize bids, and improve campaign structure based on performance data to steadily improve your ROI over time.

pricingInfo: Google Ads management for Galway City businesses typically includes a monthly management fee starting from €500 for small campaigns (€1,000-€2,000 ad spend) up to €2,000+ monthly management for larger campaigns (€10,000+ ad spend), plus your actual Google Ads budget. Management fees are usually 15-20% of ad spend. We recommend minimum ad budgets of €30-50 per day for competitive Galway City keywords. Contact us for a free PPC audit and custom proposal based on your specific goals and budget.
serviceArea: Galway City and surrounding areas including Oranmore, Salthill, Knocknacarra, Renmore, and all of County Galway
availability: Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM GMT. Campaign monitoring and optimization daily.
yearsExperience: 15+ years combined Google Ads and PPC experience

h2Headings: Why Galway City Businesses Choose Kraft Agency for Google Ads
Our Proven Google Ads Management Process
Types of Google Ads Campaigns We Manage
Success Stories: PPC Results from Galway Businesses
Google Ads FAQs for Galway City Business Owners
Ready to Maximize Your Google Ads ROI?

faq.question: How much should my Galway business spend on Google Ads?
faq.answer: Budget depends on your industry, competition, and goals. For most Galway City businesses, we recommend starting with €1,000-€2,000 per month (€30-60/day) to gather data and see results. Competitive industries like legal services or home services may need higher budgets. We'll recommend an appropriate budget during your free audit based on your specific situation and goals.

faq.question: How quickly will I see results from Google Ads?
faq.answer: Google Ads can drive traffic and leads almost immediately once campaigns launch. However, optimization takes time—we typically see peak performance after 2-3 months of testing and refinement. Unlike SEO, PPC delivers fast results, but best ROI comes from continuous optimization over time.

faq.question: What's the difference between Google Ads and SEO?
faq.answer: Google Ads (PPC) puts you at the top of search results immediately through paid placements, while SEO builds organic rankings over time. PPC offers immediate, controllable traffic but requires ongoing spend. SEO takes longer but delivers sustained traffic without per-click costs. Most successful Galway businesses use both strategies together.

faq.question: Can you target specific areas within Galway City?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We use advanced location targeting to focus on specific neighborhoods, postcodes, or radius targeting around your business location in Galway City. This ensures your ads reach potential customers in your service area while avoiding wasted spend on irrelevant locations.

faq.question: How do you measure Google Ads success?
faq.answer: We track comprehensive metrics including clicks, impressions, click-through rate (CTR), cost per click (CPC), conversion rate, cost per acquisition (CPA), and most importantly, return on ad spend (ROAS). You'll see exactly how many leads, sales, calls, or store visits your Google Ads generate and what ROI you're achieving.

faq.question: What types of businesses in Galway benefit from Google Ads?
faq.answer: Almost any business can benefit! We've successfully managed campaigns for Galway retailers, restaurants, professional services (legal, accounting, medical), home services (plumbers, electricians), B2B companies, e-commerce stores, tourism businesses, and more. If people search Google for what you offer, Google Ads can work for you.

faq.question: Do you manage campaigns beyond Search Ads?
faq.answer: Yes! We manage the full range of Google Ads campaign types including Search Ads, Display Ads, Shopping Ads for e-commerce, YouTube Video Ads, and Remarketing campaigns. We'll recommend the right mix for your Galway business goals and budget.

faq.question: What's your management fee structure?
faq.answer: Our management fees typically range from 15-20% of your monthly ad spend, with a minimum starting at €500/month for smaller campaigns. This includes strategy, setup, optimization, reporting, and ongoing account management. We believe in transparent pricing with no hidden fees—you'll know exactly what you're paying for.
